mapper.select: SELECT INV.TXN_ID AS txnId, INV.ITEM_ID AS itemId, INV.QTY AS quantity, INV.STATUS AS status, TO_CHAR(INV.TXN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS txnDate, IM.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, IM.ITEM_TYPE_CODE AS itemTypeCode FROM INVENTORY_TRANSACTION INV JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON INV.ITEM_ID = IM.ITEM_ID WHERE INV.STATUS = 'CONFIRMED' AND IM.ITEM_TYPE_CODE != 'RMD' ORDER BY INV.TXN_ID DESC

SELECT INS.INSPECTION_ID AS inspectionId, INS.TXN_ID AS txnId, INS.INSPECTOR_ID AS inspectorId, INS.INSPECT_TYPE AS inspectType, INS.DEFECT_QTY AS defectQty, INS.INSPECTION_RESULT AS inspectionResult, INS.REMARKS AS remarks, TO_CHAR(INS.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdAt, INV.ITEM_ID AS itemId, INV.QTY AS quantity, INV.STATUS AS status, TO_CHAR(INV.TXN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS txnDate, IM.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, IM.ITEM_TYPE_CODE AS itemTypeCode FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION INS JOIN INVENTORY_TRANSACTION INV ON INS.TXN_ID = INV.TXN_ID JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON INV.ITEM_ID = IM.ITEM_ID ORDER BY INS.INSPECTION_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUALITY_INSPECTION ( INSPECTION_ID, TXN_ID, INSPECTOR_ID, INSPECT_TYPE, TOTAL_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, INSPECTION_RESULT, REMARKS, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{inspectionId}, #{txnId}, #{inspectorId}, #{inspectType}, (SELECT QTY FROM INVENTORY_TRANSACTION WHERE TXN_ID = #{txnId}), #{defectQty}, #{inspectionResult}, #{remarks}, SYSDATE + (9/24) )
mapper.select: SELECT IM.ITEM_TYPE_CODE FROM INVENTORY_TRANSACTION INV JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM ON INV.ITEM_ID = IM.ITEM_ID WHERE INV.TXN_ID = #{txnId}
